original_title: I'm Too Old For This Sh*t: A Heavy Metal Fairytale
overview: A high school band named Siren who haven't played in 35 years discover they have a fan base in Germany due to a demo they put out so many years ago. This film documents their story as they journey to meet the fans they never knew they had.
title: I'm Too Old For This Sh*t: A Heavy Metal Fairytale
